attributes.review:

attributes.review: This is one of the worst apps I have ever downloaded! It attacked every person who wasn’t an old, straight cis white male.  It was almost as if the app was discriminatory against members of the LGBTQ+ society and those who aren’t white. I hope that this app loses all of its followers and support for its ignorant stances and opinions!
attributes.title: Offensive and Crude

I WAS BORN IN AMERICA jesus christ
attributes.title: help ?

attributes.review: I read all the reviews and they all say something abt a cheeto. witch at first i was confused, but then i opened the app and there was a giant cheeto on my screen😳 i almost had a heart attack and i consider this app a risk to all living things including animals who might accidentally see this.

attributes.review: When I opened the app I saw a naked sweaty Cheeto. My daughter was next to me and she was so horrified she cried and peed on my new couch. Now I have to buy a new couch because of this disgusting Cheeto. How do you even get that shade of orange? Anyways I want a check from the “president” to pay for my new couch so I don’t have to sit on a urine colored couch.
attributes.title: DISGUSTING
